question:
National Clean Energy Fund (NCEF):
  1. is created for funding research and innovative projects in clean energy technologies for public as well as private sector
  2. has been constituted under the Public Account of India
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
National Clean Energy Fund (NCEF) has been constituted under the Public Account of India. It has been created for funding research and innovative projects in clean energy technologies for public as well as private sector.
